Kingston Law College (কিংস্টন ল কলেজ) is a Legal education institution situated at Berunanpukuria, North 24 Parganas in the indian state of West Bengal. It is affiliated to the West Bengal State University. It offers 3 years and 5-year Integrated Course in Law leading to LL.B and B.A. LL.B. degree which is approved by the Bar Council of India (BCI), New Delhi. From the year of 2004 to 2007 it was under University of Calcutta.
History
Kingston Educational Institute established various branches of study. In 2004 it set up Kingston Science College and Kingston Law college at Berunanpukuria. At present, it is one of the two law college under the West Bengal State University. From the year of 2004 to 2007 Kingston Law College was under the University of Calcutta i.e. Calcutta University.
